## Checklist

- [ ] Code follows existing style conventions
- [ ] Tests added/updated if applicable
- [ ] Documentation updated if applicable
- [ ] No breaking changes (or documented breaking changes)
- [ ] Linked to related issue (if applicable)
- [ ] Target branch is `custom`
- [ ] PR is up to date with default branch
- [ ] No merge conflicts
- [ ] Title accurately describes changes

## Categories

Use one of these labels:
- `bug` - Bug fix
- `enhancement` - New feature
- `refactor` - Code refactoring
- `docs` - Documentation changes
- `infrastructure` - CI/CD, build, or deployment changes
- `code-quality` - Quality improvements
- `test` - Test additions or fixes
- `RnD` - Research & Development improvements
